SAYS: I had to put my card in every single time.

THINKS: I wish there was a more straightforward way to find new events.
I feel frustrated by the lack of clarity on event postings.

DOES: Checks the app for new event postings.

Uses both the app and website, but prefers the app.
Engages with content on both platforms, despite their differences.
